name: Flip Hero - Spider Hook
description:
Flip Hero is finally out! Hook and make an epic swing and flip like a spiderman or another super hero above deadly saws, cliffs and other obstacles. Try not to hurt your hero and keep him alive. But you know what, forget it, it’s impossible.

Finish all the levels like a boss spider-man and unlock all super heroes. Every hero is unique and epic! It's like stickman hook or spiderman hook, but fun is guaranteed. Become a real flip master!

You just need to do the following:
- Tap to shoot a rope and hook
- Make an epic swing and amazing trick
- Avoid every deadly obstacle on your way
- Swing from hook to hook to pass all the levels and earn as many coins as you can

The faster you fly, more like a spider you will be.

Why is Flip Hero so great?
- You can swing like a spider
- Your stickman gets hurt with epic animations
- There are so many super heroes waiting for you in the game
